ygData.subject: Re: Spider silk mask
ygData.msgSnippet: Djarns has no AC. I look at it this way. When I am in a group doing somthing I usually have a shaman and a cleric. Shaman buffs give me the stat bonuses well
ygData.messageBody:
Djarns has no AC. I look at it this way. When I am in a group doing somthing
I usually have a shaman and a cleric. Shaman buffs give me the stat bonuses
well into the upper 100's and My ceric can drop one of the symbol line of
spells on me for alot more HP with the shaman str buff alone my atk goes
over 1000 the thing I am lacking the most at this point is AC AC AC. so when
I look for equipment I go for things that give me a good AC bonus and a good
stat modifier if at all possible.

Kizmet Bayashi
Monk of the 46th.....
E-Marr
Da`Kor

From: Bennett, Brian <BRIAN.BENNETT@...>

as

>
> Kizmet Bayashi
> Monk of the 46th ...

> ----- Original Message -----
> From: kahlant <brentrobinson@...>
> To: <EQ-Monks@onelist.com>

> Subject: Re: [EQ-Monks] Spider silk mask
>
>
> > From: "kahlant" <brentrobinson@...>
> >
> > Good base for a high level are the following:
> >
> > Fishbone Earring
> > Electrun Sapphire Earring
> > BP Necklace
> > Spider Silk Mask (think a named spider in Karana's drops)
> > Executioer's Hood
> > BP Ring
> > BP Ring
> > Serpentine Bracers
> > Azure Sleeves
> > Lupine Claw Guantlets
> > Foreman's Tunic
> > Cloak of Shadows
> > Flowing Black Silk Sash
> > Drake-hide leggings
> > Wolf-fur Slippers
> >
> > Even better, next step up from the above are the following (some of this
> > comes from the planes):
> >
> > replace the serpentine bracers with Shiverback-hide Wristbands
> > replace the azure sleves with Shiverback-hide Armbands
> > replace the lupine claw guantlets with Guantlets of Fiery Might
> > replace the Foresman tunic with Shiverback-hide Jerkin
> > replace the Cloak of Shadows with the Cloak of Flames
> > replace the Flowing Black Sash with a Thick Banded Belt
> > replace the Drake-hide leggins with Shiverback-hide leggins
> > replace the wolf-fur slippers with Shiverback-hide boots
> >
> > hope these help at least a little. Credit comes from
> > http://eq.stomped.com/monks/
> > Check out the Ultimate Monk link.
> >
> > Subai
> > Fennin Ro
> >
